excavation.name: Excavation
excavation.desc: Get 20% more out of ruins, by skill level. Multiplicative.

sensor.name: Sensor
sensor.desc: Use of sensors. Currently they do nothing.

warp_navigation.name: Warp Navigation
warp_navigation.desc: Traverse more exotic kinds of wormholes. If you don't know what that means, you don't need it yet.
